components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: WhatsApp Sender Onboarding Failures When Using Senders API

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue with WhatsApp onboarding when using the Senders API blocking customers from onboarding to WhatsApp and are still working to deploy a fix. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue with WhatsApp onboarding when using the Senders API blocking customers from onboarding to WhatsApp and are working to deploy a fix. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers are investigating an issue with WhatsApp onboarding when using the Senders API blocking customers from onboarding to WhatsApp. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with WhatsApp Onboarding. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS and MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in US and Canada is conducting a planned maintenance from 05 December 2024 at 20:00 PST until 06 December 2024 at 00:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US and Canada handsets via subset of US and Canada long codes, short codes and toll free numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: TaskRouter scheduled maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Maintenance activity: We would be updating the TaskRouter database, in the US1 region, to remove non-essential components from the system. There are pre and post activities around this update and hence this longer maintenance window of 2 hours. The actual database update, however, is expected to be completed within a second and would not impact your service. 

Monitoring: Our team will closely watch the system performance during and after the maintenance window as well to ensure everything runs smoothly.

Contingency plan: In the unlikely event of encountering any issues, we are prepared to immediately revert the changes. Should a rollback be deemed necessary, then there could be a short downtime of approximately 2 minutes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our Voice carrier partner in Australia and New Zealand is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 03 December 2024 at 01:00 PST until 12 December 2024 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures from Twilio Australia and New Zealand phone numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

03 December 2024 at 01:00 PST until 03 December 2024 at 04:00 PST
05 December 2024 at 01:00 PST until 05 December 2024 at 04:00 PST
10 December 2024 at 01:00 PST until 10 December 2024 at 04:00 PST
12 December 2024 at 01:00 PST until 12 December 2024 at 04:00 PST
